Articles.Content: Hello Kerbals, I am looking for a mod. I've been playing for a while now, got about 118hrs of gameplay in. I've mostly been playing career and just started a science sandbox and I was wondering what your favorite mods are to add a little more flavor to the game. I'd like to certainly start some life supporting colonies and all that good stuff. I'm running stage recovery mod, and ubiowelding mod. Let me know what your favorite mods are and why they are your favorite ^_^
